extendedInfo.description: The Lottery System Generator.  A system for a 'pick 6' lottery.  Improve your lottery odds, by playing systematically!----------------------12 Numbers: 20 Tickets ('Pick 6' Lottery game)----------------------1.Pick a total of 12 Numbers.2.Click those numbers. (They are added to the list at the bottom)3.Click the 'Generate' button.4.Fill out 20 lottery tickets with the 20 sets of 6. (based on your chosen 12 numbers)This system increases your spread of numbers.---------------------100% Mathematical Guarantee: If you 'score' 3 out of the 12 numbers, you will win a minimum 3/6 Prize, based on this permutation system.Note: This is the minimum prize, however it drastically increases your odds on the bigger prizes.---------------------         Keywords: Lottery, lottery system, jackpot, win the lottery, lottery numbers, lottery systematically, lottery mathematics, statistics lottery, lottery draws, win the lottery, lottery systems

reviews.comment: This is the worst app ive downloaded.Pointless and stupid.
reviews.author: A Google User
